summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City employment; authorizing the Mayor to sign two memoranda of understanding between the City of Seattle and the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers, District Lodge 160, Local 79 authorizing wages, benefits and other conditions of employment for January 1, 2009 through December 31, 2011, and establishing a 2010 furlough program; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
